content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'lake_vyadls_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [lake_vyadls_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION   = 'https://vyadls.dfs.core.windows.net/lake', 
	)
Go


IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseDeltaFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseDeltaFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = DELTA)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.covidimport
 WITH (
     LOCATION = 'covid_external',
     DATA_SOURCE = [lake_vyadls_dfs_core_windows_net],  
     FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat] 
 )  
 AS
 SELECT *
 FROM OPENROWSET(
     BULK 'https://vyadls.dfs.core.windows.net/lake/covid',
     FORMAT = 'Delta')  as f;
    


drop external table dbo.covid
 CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.covid (
	[iso_code] varchar(8000),
	[continent] varchar(8000),
	[location] varchar(8000),
	[date] date,
	[total_cases] varchar(8000),
	[new_cases] varchar(8000),
	[new_cases_smoothed] varchar(8000),
	[total_deaths] varchar(8000),
	[new_deaths] varchar(8000),
	[new_deaths_smoothed] varchar(8000),
	[total_cases_per_million] varchar(8000),
	[new_cases_per_million] varchar(8000),
	[new_cases_smoothed_per_million] varchar(8000),
	[total_deaths_per_million] varchar(8000),
	[new_deaths_per_million] varchar(8000),
	[new_deaths_smoothed_per_million] varchar(8000),
	[reproduction_rate] varchar(8000),
	[icu_patients] varchar(8000),
	[icu_patients_per_million] varchar(8000),
	[hosp_patients] varchar(8000),
	[hosp_patients_per_million] varchar(8000),
	[weekly_icu_admissions] varchar(8000),
	[weekly_icu_admissions_per_million] varchar(8000),
	[weekly_hosp_admissions] varchar(8000),
	[weekly_hosp_admissions_per_million] varchar(8000),
	[new_tests] varchar(8000),
	[total_tests] varchar(8000),
	[total_tests_per_thousand] varchar(8000),
	[new_tests_per_thousand] varchar(8000),
	[new_tests_smoothed] varchar(8000),
	[new_tests_smoothed_per_thousand] varchar(8000),
	[positive_rate] varchar(8000),
	[tests_per_case] varchar(8000),
	[tests_units] varchar(8000),
	[total_vaccinations] varchar(8000),
	[people_vaccinated] varchar(8000),
	[people_fully_vaccinated] varchar(8000),
	[new_vaccinations] varchar(8000),
	[new_vaccinations_smoothed] varchar(8000),
	[total_vaccinations_per_hundred] varchar(8000),
	[people_vaccinated_per_hundred] varchar(8000),
	[people_fully_vaccinated_per_hundred] varchar(8000),
	[new_vaccinations_smoothed_per_million] varchar(8000),
	[stringency_index] varchar(8000),
	[population] varchar(8000),
	[population_density] varchar(8000),
	[median_age] varchar(8000),
	[aged_65_older] varchar(8000),
	[aged_70_older] varchar(8000),
	[gdp_per_capita] varchar(8000),
	[extreme_poverty] varchar(8000),
	[cardiovasc_death_rate] varchar(8000),
	[diabetes_prevalence] varchar(8000),
	[female_smokers] varchar(8000),
	[male_smokers] varchar(8000),
	[handwashing_facilities] varchar(8000),
	[hospital_beds_per_thousand] varchar(8000),
	[life_expectancy] varchar(8000),
	[human_development_index] varchar(8000),
	[excess_mortality] varchar(8000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'covid',
	DATA_SOURCE = [lake_vyadls_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDeltaFormat]
	)
GO

select distinct location from dbo.covidimport order by location


select distinct location from dbo.covid order by location
select top 100 * from dbo.covid order by location


CREATE or ALTER VIEW dbo.covid_view AS 
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://vyadls.dfs.core.windows.net/lake/covid',
        FORMAT='DELTA'
    ) AS [result]

Go

select distinct location from dbo.covid_view order by location


CREATE or ALTER VIEW dbo.holiday_view AS 
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://vyadls.dfs.core.windows.net/lake/holiday',
        FORMAT='DELTA'
    ) AS [result]

Go

select * from dbo.holiday_view
